metadata.title: CVE-2022-3815 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, has been found inAxiomatic Bento4. This issue affects some unknown processing of thecomponent mp4decrypt. The manipulation leads to memory leak. The attack maybe initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and maybe used. The identifier VDB-212681 was assigned to this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
